description: Real Madrid are fined by Uefa after some of their fans directed homophobic chants towards Manchester City manager Pep Guardiola in their Champions League second-leg tie at the Bernabeu.
title: Real Madrid: Spanish side fined for homophobic chanting towards Man City boss Pep Guardiola
title_page: Real Madrid: Spanish side fined for homophobic chanting towards Man City boss Pep Guardiola - BBC Sport
